    public class SslHandshakeInfoHandler
extends io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter
    Stores info about the client and server's SSL certificates in the context, after a successful handshake. User: michaels@netflix.com Date: 3/29/16 Time: 10:48 AM
